社会关怀和数据的未来NDG 反映了 NHS 与社会关怀之间的关系以及使用数据的重要性。她还概述了 Caldicott Guardians 对处理社会护理数据的组织的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-future-of-social-care-and-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-future-of-social-care-and-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75bef816-7b89-4aaa-806a-80cd8ea15634 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 12:06:12 -0400 The future of social care and data
UKHSA 推出新战略，准备和应对健康威胁新战略阐述了 UKHSA 未来 3 年的愿景和目标，以准备和应对健康威胁，并建立未来保护国家的能力和技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/UKHSA-unveils-new-strategy-to-prepare-for-and-respond-to-health-threats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/UKHSA-unveils-new-strategy-to-prepare-for-and-respond-to-health-threats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a9bfae6-801e-4d8a-b7e1-7ef6c2cb9cbd Tue, 25 Jul 2023 12:00:34 -0400 UKHSA unveils new strategy to prepare for and respond to health threats

医院第 14 次要求国会推迟 ACA 医疗补助资金削减这在华盛顿已经成为像春天的樱花一样熟悉的景象：来自全国医院的游说者聚集在国会大厦，要求立法者推迟《平价医疗法案》规定的数十亿美元的医疗补助资金削减——这是行业领袖多年前同意的削减措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Hospitals-ask-Congress-to-delay-ACA-Medicaid-funding-cuts-e28094-for-the-14th-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Hospitals-ask-Congress-to-delay-ACA-Medicaid-funding-cuts-e28094-for-the-14th-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97961bd3-5563-4449-b5e9-d24f4fb16a23 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 06:50:02 -0400 Hospitals ask Congress to delay ACA Medicaid funding cuts — for the 14th time
